<em>&nbsp;<em>

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**[BudgetNode](https://budgetnode.com)** is a brand of Access Internet Ltd (Company Number: _10219199_).  

Our aim is to provide good quality services and support without the high price tag.  

All services come with a 7 day money back guarantee if the service is not as described. We accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Card (via 2Checkout), and Bitcoin.  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

We offer our services in US East (Ashburn & Atlanta), US West (Los Angeles), and Europe (Netherlands). London Docklands: _Coming Soon_!  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

We have upgraded our hardware in Ashburn and are now ready for new orders!  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

We are re-opening the OpenVZ DOUBLE RAM special for a limited time! Use promo code **DOUBLERAM** (Limited uses & Expires 7th March 2017). Due to the large amount of orders last time, please open a ticket to claim upgrade.  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

__________
**Features**
-

* 100Mbps or 1Gbps Port Speed (depending on plan)
* Free Internal/Private Network
* HTML5 Serial Console (OpenVZ)
* VNC HTML5 Console (KVM)
* DDoS Protected Networks
* Edge firewall rules possible (block or ratelimit protocols). 
* Instant Provisioning (subject to fraud screening)
* SolusVM Control Panel
* Instant rDNS Control
* TUN/TAP, PPP, GRE, FUSE, & SIT Support
* Custom ISOs right from the panel (**KVM**)
* OS Templates: CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, OpenSUSE, Scientific Linux, Linux Mint & Desktop Environments

__________
**Hardware**
-

We provision services on various different configurations:

* E3 v1/v2/v3+, E5-1650v3/v4, Dual E5v2/v4, Dual L5639/40, Dual X5650
* 32GB, 64GB, 72GB, 128GB, 144GB, 256GB+ DDR3/DDR4 ECC RAM
* Enterprise 4 x 2-3TB SATA-3 6Gb/s Drives in RAID10
* Supermicro/Dell 4-bay Hotswap Chassis  
* Dedicated 1Gbps Uplink
<em>&nbsp;<em>
__________
